short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DAN Extension for use with practice management software.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Use DAN seamlessly with your web-based practice management system. 
The DAN Chrome extension enables you to start and access clinical audio and transcription records directly from your Practice Management System in just 1 click. It simplifies workflow by eliminating patient id copy-paste tasks, ensuring patient privacy and accuracy.
